original_title: Reverend Yolanda's Old Time Gospel Hour
overview: Reverend Yolanda is a country gospel singing, interfaith minister Drag Queen whose work as an artist and activist has earned him a place in the GLBT Hall of Fame and Blue Hall of Fame. This heart warming film features her live stage show filled with Reverend Yolanda's music and humor combined with interviews of Yolanda and the people she loves.
title: Reverend Yolanda's Old Time Gospel Hour
